title: Copd Resources For Health Professionals
content:
May 15, 2024
COPD Resources for Health Professionals
At a glance
Health professionals can refer to this list of key organizations and resources on chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) for more information.
Resources
COPD National Action Plan
The
COPD National Action Plan
is the first-ever blueprint for a muti-faceted, unified fight against COPD. For  health professionals, the plan provides guidance and information on building awareness, improving care, and turning policy to action.
